sections.paragraph: + Same as [867]Micah 6. (2 Chronicles 34:25) + Same as [868]Micha 3. (1 Chronicles 9:15; Nehemiah 12:35) + One of the priests at the dedication of the wall of Jerusalem. (Nehemiah 12:41) + The daughter of Uriel of Gibeah, wife of Rehoboam and mother of Abijah king of Judah. (2 Chronicles 13:2) [[869]Maachah,3] + One of the princes of Jehoshaphat whom he sent to teach the law of Jehovah in the cities of Judah. (2 Chronicles 17:7) + The son of Gemariah. He is only mentioned on one occasion. (Jeremiah 36:11,13,14)
